title: Leaving a Legacy of Faith (Part 2 of 2)
itunes:author: Guest: Dan Seaborn
itunes:summary:
Pastor Dan Seaborn shares heartfelt family stories to illustrate the importance of passing along our faith to the next generation. He encourages parents to teach their children Godly principles through modeling, good communication, and generational influence. (Part 2 of 2)


Receive the book "Winning At Home" and the audio download of the broadcast "Leaving a Legacy of Faith " for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-10-06?refcd=1493102


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/leaving-a-legacy-of-faith-part-2-of-2/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
